User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches auth.uid).

email.description: The email address of the user.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a single financial transaction (income, expense, or payment).

date.description: Timestamp of when the transaction occurred.

description.description: A brief description of the transaction.

categoryId.description: ID of the expense category (only for 'gasto' type).

accountId.description: ID of the account this transaction is paying off (only for 'pago' type).

name.description: The name of the expense category.

Account.title: Account
Account.description: Represents a payable account or debt.

name.description: The name of the account (e.g., 'Credit Card Bill').

paidAmount.description: The amount that has been paid so far.

Appointment.title: Appointment
Appointment.description: Represents a single appointment or event in the user's schedule.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this appointment.

Note.title: Note
Note.description: Represents a single note for the user.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the note was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the note was last updated.

Investment.title: Investment
Investment.description: Represents a user's investment in an asset, like a cryptocurrency or stock.

assetId.description: The ID of the asset (e.g., 'bitcoin' for crypto, 'AAPL' for stock).

symbol.description: The ticker symbol of the asset (e.g., 'BTC', 'AAPL').

amount.description: The quantity of the asset owned.

purchasePrice.description: The price per unit at the time of purchase.

purchaseDate.description: Timestamp of when the investment was made.

/users/{userId}/transactions/{transactio.description: Stores all financial transactions for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/expenseCategories/{categ.description: Stores expense categories defined by a specific user.

/users/{userId}/accounts/{accountId}.description: Stores payable accounts for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/appointments/{appointmen.description: Stores appointments for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/notes/{noteId}.description: Stores notes for a specific user.
